parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From a derivative of mneme; to exercise memory, i.e. Recollect; by implication, to punish; also to rehearse.

parse: Conjunction
str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.

parse: Adverb
str2: Adverb from the base of pou; an interrogative particle of manner; in what way?; also as exclamation, how much!

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From teros; to guard, i.e. To note; by implication, to detain; by extension, to withhold; by extension, to withhold.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From meta and noieo; to think differently or afterwards, i.e. Reconsider.

parse: Conjunction
str2: If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: (a) I am awake (in the night), watch, (b) I am watchful, on the alert, vigilant. From egeiro; to keep awake, i.e. Watch.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To have come, be present, have arrived. A primary verb; to arrive, i.e. Be present.

parse: Adverb
str2: Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Noun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: A thief. From klepto; a stealer.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.

parse: Noun - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: Apparently a primary word; an 'hour'.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: Of what sort. From the base of pou and hoios; individualizing interrogative what sort of, or which one.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To have come, be present, have arrived. A primary verb; to arrive, i.e. Be present.

parse: Preposition
str2: On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
